prompt:
Write a short and straight to the point cold email selling Tiktok ads to Ecommerce brand owners, end it with asking for a call

###
completion:
{{firstName}},

We work with fitness brands and I want to work with you to scale {{companyName}} through Tiktok (A-Z creative process handled by us)

Just did the same with a brand in the fitness space taking them from 120k p/m to 210k p/m in 60 days through TT.

Would a quick 9 min chat sound ridiculous to see if {{companyName}} might be a good fit {{firstName}}?

Lmk,

Tom

Head Honcho - apex-media.co END

prompt:

###
completion:
{{firstName}}, good to see your words are just as authentic as your ingredients! Sorry if this is a duplicate as not sure if my email was sent earlier as I was in a rush.

Hopefully, this goes through as honestly love what you have going on with {{companyName}}.

I'll be completely straight up with you {{firstName}}, as I respect your time: We specialise in running paid ads (& creating UGC) for brands in the self-care space on the house until you make a profit, and if we don't we'll fire ourselves before you even have to. 

No hassle, just results.

Sound like something you would be interested in {{firstName}}? 

Totally cool if not, but {{companyName}} caught my eye on the IG feed so wanted to shoot something over.

Lmk,

Tom END

completion: {{firstName}}, good to see your words are just as authentic as your ingredients!Was doing some consumer research/psycho analysis for a partner brand of ours in the skincare space and came across you guys at {{companyName}}.Figured I would shoot this over we are achieving really low CPA’s for our brands in beauty atm, and we would love to help some similar brands, like yourself, crush 2023 aswell.So here I am, writing this email to you {{firstName}}.However, I respect your time as another biz owner so not going to ask for 15-20 mins of your time straight up, given I am a complete stranger.Cool if I shoot over a vid explaining our pretty unique process/how to apply it to {{companyName}} when it comes to acquisition, how we work and case studies?Lmk,TomFounder - ApexP.S Not interested in acquiring customers for cheaper?
